languages.text: "Не может быть!" {n}Кассия испуганно отпрядывает, дрожа всем телом.{/n} "Это... все из-за меня! Вы проводили со мной слишком много времени. Я знала... знала, что моя сила может вам навредить. Вам больно? Скажите же! О Бог-Император, что же мне делать?" {n}Бледно-желтая петля все туже сжимается на горле Кассии, и вокруг ее головы беспорядочно мечутся всполохи красного и темно-синего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не может быть!" {n}Кассия испуганно отпрянывает, дрожа всем телом.{/n} Это... все из-за меня! Вы проводили со мной слишком много времени. Я знала... Знала, что моя сила может вам навредить. Вам больно? Скажите же! О Бог-Император, что же мне делать?" {n}Бледно-желтая петля все туже сжимается на горле Кассии, и вокруг ее головы беспорядочно мечутся всполохи красного и темно-синего.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

Я знала... знала, что моя сила может вам навредить. Вам больно? Скажите же! traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这不可能！”{n}卡西娅惊叫着后退了一步，颤抖起来。{/n}“这……这全是我的错！你和我待在一起的时间太长了。我早就知道……我早就知道这种力量会伤害到你。疼吗？快告诉我！噢，神皇在上，我该怎么办才好？”{n}一条淡黄色的绳索缠住了卡西娅的咽喉，她的头顶盘旋着不规则的红色与深蓝色闪光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这不可能！”{n}卡西娅惊叫着后退了一步，颤抖起来。{/n}“这……这全是我的错！你和我待在一起的时间太长了。我早就知道……我早就知道这种力量会伤害到你。疼吗？快告诉我！噢，神皇在上，我该怎么办才好？”{n}一条淡黄色的绳索缠住了卡西娅的咽喉，她的头顶盘旋着不规则的红色与深蓝色闪光。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das kann nicht sein!" {n}Cassia schreckt verängstigt zurück. Sie zittert am ganzen Körper.{/n} "Das ... Das liegt alles nur an mir! Ihr habt zu viel Zeit mit mir verbracht. Ich wusste ... Ich wusste, dass meine Kraft Euch verletzen kann. Tut es weh? Sagt es mir, bitte! Oh, beim Gottimperator, was soll ich denn jetzt tun?" {n}Eine Henkersschlinge aus blassem Gelb legt sich um Cassias Hals und zieht sich immer weiter zu. Rote und dunkelblaue Blitze zucken chaotisch um ihren Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das kann nicht sein!" {n}Cassia schreckt verängstigt zurück. Sie zittert am ganzen Körper.{/n} "Das ... Das liegt alles nur an mir! Ihr habt zu viel Zeit mit mir verbracht. Ich wusste ... Ich wusste, dass meine Kraft Euch verletzen kann. Tut es weh? Sagt es mir, bitte! Oh, beim Gottimperator, was soll ich denn jetzt tun?" {n}Eine Henkersschlinge aus blassem Gelb legt sich um Cassias Hals und zieht sich immer weiter zu. Rote und dunkelblaue Blitze zucken chaotisch um ihren Kopf.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est impossible ! » {n}s'exclame Cassia en reculant de peur, tremblant de la tête aux pieds.{/n} « C'est... c'est ma faute ! Vous avez passé trop de temps avec moi. Je le savais... Je savais que mon pouvoir risquait de vous faire du mal. Est-ce que vous souffrez ? Je vous en supplie, dites-le-moi ! Oh, par l'Empereur-Dieu, que dois-je faire maintenant ? » {n}Un nœud jaune pâle se resserre autour de la gorge de Cassia, et des éclairs changeants rouges et bleu foncé tourbillonnent autour de sa tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est impossible ! » {n}s'exclame Cassia en reculant de peur, tremblant de la tête aux pieds.{/n} « C'est... c'est ma faute ! Vous avez passé trop de temps avec moi. Je le savais... Je savais que mon pouvoir risquait de vous faire du mal. Est-ce que vous souffrez ? Je vous en supplie, dites-le-moi ! Oh, par l'Empereur-Dieu, que dois-je faire maintenant ? » {n}Un nœud jaune pâle se resserre autour de la gorge de Cassia, et des éclairs changeants rouges et bleu foncé tourbillonnent autour de sa tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡No puede ser!». {n}Cassia retrocede asustada. Le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Es... ¡Es por mi culpa! Ha pasado demasiado tiempo conmigo. Sabía... Sabía que mi poder podía herirle. ¿Duele? ¡Diga algo, por favor! Oh, Dios Emperador, ¿qué hago ahora?». {n}Un nudo de color amarillo claro se tensa alrededor de la garganta de Cassia y destellos erráticos de color rojo y azul oscuro giran alrededor de su cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No puede ser!». {n}Cassia retrocede asustada. Le tiembla todo el cuerpo.{/n} «Es... ¡Es por mi culpa! Ha pasado demasiado tiempo conmigo. Sabía... Sabía que mi poder podía herirle. ¿Duele? ¡Diga algo, por favor! Oh, Dios Emperador, ¿qué hago ahora?». {n}Un nudo de color amarillo claro se tensa alrededor de la garganta de Cassia y destellos erráticos de color rojo y azul oscuro giran alrededor de su cabeza.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「こんなことありえません！」{n}カシアは恐怖に後ずさる。全身が震えている。{/n}「これは…これはすべてあたくしのせいです！{name}様が、あたくしとあまりに長い時間を一緒に過ごしたから。あたくしは…自分の力があなたを傷つけるかもしれないことを知っていました。痛くありませんか？どうか教えてください！ああ、神帝陛下、あたくしはどうすべきでしょう？」{n}淡い黄色の輪縄がカシアののどをぐるりと絞めつけ、不安定な赤と濃い青の閃光が、彼女の頭の周囲で渦を巻く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}

languages.text: "Olamaz!" {n}Cassia korkuyla sıçrıyor. Tüm bedeni tir tir titriyor.{/n} "He... Hepsi benim yüzümden! Benim yanımda çok fazla vakit geçirdin. Biliyordum... Gücümün seni inciteceğini biliyordum! Canın yanıyor mu? Lütfen doğruyu söyle! Tanrı İmparator aşkına, ne yapacağım ben şimdi?" {n}Cassia'nın boynunda soluk, sarı renkli bir ilmek beliriyor. Başının etrafında kırmızı, koyu mavi renkler çakarak dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That cannot be!" {n}Cassia recoils in fear, her whole body trembling.{/n} "It's... It's all because of me! You have spent too much time with me. I knew... I knew my power might hurt you. Does it hurt? Tell me, please! Oh, God-Emperor, what do I do now?" {n}A noose of pale yellow tightens around Cassia's throat, and erratic flashes of red and dark blue whirl around her head.{/n}
